{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Soyo |model=AWRO3101 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B0053JUSSW |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/30/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model=ARM904 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MQ4ARM904,M4Y-XG-600 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Brecis |cpu1_model=MSP2007 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV800B-70EC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16100-7T |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Z-Com XG-601 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Untitled |default_ssid_regex=^Untitled$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:E0:98 |oui_eth=00:E0:98 }} ''Aerielink 802.11g Wireless AP Router with 4-port Switch''
[http://web.archive.org/web/20040608042803/http://www.soyousa.com/products/proddesc.php?id=267 Product page (via archive.org)] (first appeared on the site [http://web.archive.org/web/20030819232349/http://www.soyousa.com/products/proddesc.php?id=267 08/19/2003]) :[http://web.archive.org/web/20040505022110/http://www.soyousa.com/dl/manuals/Wireless_LAN/awro3101_manual.pdf Manual] This device was part of the SWRK1401U1 ''Aerielink Router Kit''.. which appears to have been sold for [http://web.archive.org/web/20031107031911/http://shop.soyousa.com/customer/home.php?cat=7 $59.99]. [http://www.3dnews.ru/communication/soyo-wireless/ Review of the device on '''3dnews.ru'''] (dated 2004-03-15) Specifications, per the manual, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::189 mm x 122 mm x 27 mm|189 mm (W) x 122 mm (D) x 27 mm (H)]] *Operating Temperature: 0째C to 40째C *Storage Temperature: -10째C to 70째C *Power: 12 VDC, 800 mA (conflicts w/ vendor's product page) [http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833178001 On Newegg]
